availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Philip Noel (Clay Township, Scioto County Ohio, farmer.)

body.p: Scioto County, Ohio, farmer. Ohio native. Son of Aaron Noel and Catharine A. Noel. Married to Hannah V. Powers Noel in Scioto County, Ohio, on June 24, 1860. Father of Jennie Noel and Bell Noel. Attended school in Scioto County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Scioto County in 1860. Farmer in Scioto County in 1863. Charged with assaulting Harriet Jane Brown in Scioto County in 1865. Fugitive from justice in Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:

Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Scioto County Marriages, 1804-1867, Film 000292694.
